TextView.android:text:
Welcome to version 2.1 of Textspansion! We've done quite a bit since our last version.

First, we'll be putting all of our update information in these convenient dialogs from now on.

Second, we've added support for date and time tokens. Now a token like %t will expand to 1/10/2012 9:19PM. A list of all tokens can be viewed in the settings.

Speaking of settings, our last update adds a much improved tutorial that can now be viewed in the app settings and whenever you launch the app for the first time.

As always, feel free to email the developers at 1393.Designs@gmail.com questions, comments, or feature suggestions.
